snippet: Kathy Delaney-Smith improved her record to 514-347 over 32 seasons with the Crimson, tying Princeton’s Pete Carril for the most basketball victories by an Ivy League coach.
abstract: College Basketball Women's Roundup; Harvard coach Kathy Delaney-Smith improves her record to 514-347 over 32 seasons, tying Ivy League record for most victories, as Harvard defeats Columbia, 64-51; other women's results noted.
lead_paragraph: Kathy Delaney-Smith improved her record to 514-347 over 32 seasons with the Crimson, tying Princeton’s Pete Carril for the most basketball victories by an Ivy League coach.

headline.main: Harvard Coach Ties Ivy League Record for Wins; UConn Remains Undefeated
headline.print_headline: Harvard Coach Ties Ivy League Record for Wins; UConn Remains Undefeated
